## Paso 1: Instala la librería de ayuda

V1

```{pyodide-python}
required_libraries = ["IPython"]
await micropip.install(required_libraries)
print("Librerias instaladas:", ",".join(required_libraries))
```

V2

```{pyodide-python}
import pyodide_http
pyodide_http.patch_all()

import urllib.request
import sys

# URL
url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sebastiandres/pyscape/refs/heads/main/quarto/verification.py"

# Print the content
with urllib.request.urlopen(url) as response:
    content = response.read().decode("utf-8")
    print(content)

# Download the file
urllib.request.urlretrieve(
    "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sebastiandres/pyscape/refs/heads/main/quarto/verification.py",
    "/verification.py"
)

# Add root to sys.path and import
sys.path.append("/")
import verification
print("✅ Module imported successfully!")
print(dir(verification))
```
